heading: 📖 Introduction
terms: 🌅 Confess ("App") is an anonymous social platform designed for free expression using alias identities ("aliasName").
🗣️ The platform allows users to share thoughts, feelings, and opinions openly, without fear of judgment.
⚖️ This freedom, however, comes with responsibilities. By using Confess, you agree to comply with all guidelines, laws, and regulations stated here.
🔐 The Developer of Confess is dedicated to ensuring user privacy, safety, national security, and legal compliance.
📅 This Disclaimer is effective from 20th July 2025 and will be legally binding for all Users who install or use the App.

heading: 🌐 Nature of the Platform
terms: 🆔 Confess is a platform for self-expression where alias identities are allowed for anonymity.
🚫 Anonymity does not absolve users of accountability. Misuse of the platform is strictly prohibited.
📝 All content is user-generated, and the Developer does not endorse any user content.
☮️ Hate speech, terrorism propaganda, or abusive remarks targeting religion, caste, race, nationality, or gender are forbidden.
⚠️ Users violating these rules risk immediate suspension or permanent account termination.

heading: ⚖️ Legal Compliance & National Interest
terms: 🔍 The Developer reserves full rights to monitor, review, and report any unlawful use of the App.
🔒 Confess implements end-to-end encryption (E2E), but in cases of national threats, data may be decrypted for legal authorities.
💣 Violations include terrorism propaganda, religious hate, threats to national leaders, or incitement of violence.
📡 User data such as IP addresses, login logs, and metadata may be shared with law enforcement when required by law.

terms: 🧑‍💻 Users are solely responsible for the content they post on Confess.
✅ By posting, you confirm you have the rights over your content.
🚫 You agree not to share defamatory, pornographic, hateful, or illegal material.

heading: 🔐 Privacy & Data Protection
terms: 🔏 Confess prioritizes user privacy with advanced encryption.
📵 We do not sell or trade personal or alias information with third parties.
🔑 E2E encryption ensures no unauthorized party, including the Developer, can read messages.
🗑️ Users can request complete account and data deletion at any time.
📂 Metadata may be retained temporarily for law enforcement compliance.
